languages.text: {n}Брезгливо поморщившись, Ульфар участливо интересуется:{/n} "Ты во всякую ксеносскую погань пальцы суешь, эттфатер, или эта тебе чем-то понравилась? Не хочешь, чтобы я быстро и почти небольно отрубил тебе эту руку, пока чего не вышло? Аугмент славный выберем... Нет?"

{n}Wrinkling his nose in disgust, Ulfar asks,{/n} "Do you go poking your fingers in every kind of xenos filth you encounter, Aett-Vater, or have you just taken a liking to this? Would you like me to chop off that hand before something happens? It will be quick and almost painless. We'll choose a nice augment for it... No?"
languages.original_text: {n}Брезгливо поморщившись, Ульфар участливо интересуется:{/n} "Ты во всякую ксеносскую погань пальцы суешь, эттфатер, или эта тебе чем-то понравилась? Не хочешь, чтобы я быстро и почти небольно отрубил тебе эту руку, пока чего не вышло? Аугмент славный выберем... Нет?"

Would you like me to chop off that hand before something happens? It will be quick and almost painless. We'll choose a nice augment for it... No?"

Would you like me to chop off that hand before something happens? It will be quick and almost painless. We'll choose a nice augment for it... No?"

languages.text: {n}不快感から鼻にしわを寄せて、ウルファーは尋ねる。{/n}「汚い異種族をみれば、とにかく関わり合いになろうとするんだな、アエット＝ヴァテル？それともこいつが気に入っただけか？事が起こる前に、俺があいつの手を切っておいてやろうか？素早くやるからほとんど痛みはない。俺らが代わりにいいオーギュメントを見繕ってや…違うのか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Wrinkling his nose in disgust, Ulfar asks,{/n} "Do you go poking your fingers in every kind of xenos filth you encounter, Aett-Vater, or have you just taken a liking to this? Would you like me to chop off that hand before something happens? It will be quick and almost painless. We'll choose a nice augment for it... No?"

traits.locale_text: {n}不快感から鼻にしわを寄せて、ウルファーは尋ねる。{/n}「汚い異種族をみれば、とにかく関わり合いになろうとするんだな、アエット＝ヴァテル？それともこいつが気に入っただけか？事が起こる前に、俺があいつの手を切っておいてやろうか？素早くやるからほとんど痛みはない。俺らが代わりにいいオーギュメントを見繕ってや…違うのか？」

languages.text: {n}乌尔法厌恶地抽着鼻子，开口问道。{/n}“狼领，你是不管碰到什么异形的脏东西，都非得伸指头戳一戳吗？还是说，你就好这口？要不要趁着还没出什么意外，我先把你的手砍下来？我动手很快，几乎不会有什么痛苦。然后我们再给你挑个不错的义肢……你不愿意？”
languages.original_text: {n}Wrinkling his nose in disgust, Ulfar asks,{/n} "Do you go poking your fingers in every kind of xenos filth you encounter, Aett-Vater, or have you just taken a liking to this? Would you like me to chop off that hand before something happens? It will be quick and almost painless. We'll choose a nice augment for it... No?"

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法厌恶地抽着鼻子，开口问道。{/n}“狼领，你是不管碰到什么异形的脏东西，都非得伸指头戳一戳吗？还是说，你就好这口？要不要趁着还没出什么意外，我先把你的手砍下来？我动手很快，几乎不会有什么痛苦。然后我们再给你挑个不错的义肢……你不愿意？”

languages.text: {n}Ulfar plisse le nez de dégoût, puis demande :{/n} « Vous ne pouvez pas vous empêcher de toucher toutes les saloperies xénos que vous trouvez, aett-vater, ou y avez-vous pris goût ? Je ferais peut-être mieux de vous couper la main avant qu'il vous arrive quelque chose. Ce sera rapide et presque sans douleur. Nous vous choisirons une belle augmentation pour la remplacer... Non ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Wrinkling his nose in disgust, Ulfar asks,{/n} "Do you go poking your fingers in every kind of xenos filth you encounter, Aett-Vater, or have you just taken a liking to this? Would you like me to chop off that hand before something happens? It will be quick and almost painless. We'll choose a nice augment for it... No?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar plisse le nez de dégoût, puis demande :{/n} « Vous ne pouvez pas vous empêcher de toucher toutes les saloperies xénos que vous trouvez, aett-vater, ou y avez-vous pris goût ? Je ferais peut-être mieux de vous couper la main avant qu'il vous arrive quelque chose. Ce sera rapide et presque sans douleur. Nous vous choisirons une belle augmentation pour la remplacer... Non ? »

languages.text: {n}Ulfar arruga la nariz con disgusto y pregunta:{/n} «¿Se dedica a meter los dedos en cualquier xenos roñoso que se encuentra, Aett-Vater, o es que lo hace por placer? ¿Quiere que le corte esa mano antes de que le ocurra algo? Será rápido y casi indoloro. Ya la reemplazaremos con un aumento en condiciones... ¿Le parece?».
languages.original_text: {n}Wrinkling his nose in disgust, Ulfar asks,{/n} "Do you go poking your fingers in every kind of xenos filth you encounter, Aett-Vater, or have you just taken a liking to this? Would you like me to chop off that hand before something happens? It will be quick and almost painless. We'll choose a nice augment for it... No?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar arruga la nariz con disgusto y pregunta:{/n} «¿Se dedica a meter los dedos en cualquier xenos roñoso que se encuentra, Aett-Vater, o es que lo hace por placer? ¿Quiere que le corte esa mano antes de que le ocurra algo? Será rápido y casi indoloro. Ya la reemplazaremos con un aumento en condiciones... ¿Le parece?».

languages.text: {n}Ulfar rümpft angewidert die Nase und fragt: {/n} "Steckt Ihr Eure Finger in jedes Stück Xenosscheiße, auf das Ihr trefft, Aett-Vater, oder hat es Euch nur dieses hier angetan? Soll ich vorsichtshalber Eure Hand abhacken, ehe etwas passiert? Geht auch ganz schnell und fast schmerzlos. Und dann suchen wir uns eine hübsche Augmentation dafür ... Nein?"
languages.original_text: {n}Wrinkling his nose in disgust, Ulfar asks,{/n} "Do you go poking your fingers in every kind of xenos filth you encounter, Aett-Vater, or have you just taken a liking to this? Would you like me to chop off that hand before something happens? It will be quick and almost painless. We'll choose a nice augment for it... No?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar rümpft angewidert die Nase und fragt: {/n} "Steckt Ihr Eure Finger in jedes Stück Xenosscheiße, auf das Ihr trefft, Aett-Vater, oder hat es Euch nur dieses hier angetan? Soll ich vorsichtshalber Eure Hand abhacken, ehe etwas passiert? Geht auch ganz schnell und fast schmerzlos. Und dann suchen wir uns eine hübsche Augmentation dafür ... Nein?"

languages.text: {n}Tiksintiyle burnunu buruşturan Ulfar sormaya başlıyor.{/n} "Karşılaştığın her türlü zeno pisliğine parmağını sokuyor musun Aett-Vater yoksa bunu özellikle mi sevdin? Bir şey olmadan önce elini kesmemi ister misin? Hızlı, neredeyse acısız olur. Yerine de güzel bir ogment seçeriz, olmaz mı?"
languages.original_text: {n}Wrinkling his nose in disgust, Ulfar asks,{/n} "Do you go poking your fingers in every kind of xenos filth you encounter, Aett-Vater, or have you just taken a liking to this? Would you like me to chop off that hand before something happens? It will be quick and almost painless. We'll choose a nice augment for it... No?"
